content.rendered:
CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY

At Caravelle Saigon, we duly recognize the importance of environmental and social sustainability, alongside our unwavering commitment to make a positive impact on our local community. It is with a profound sense of responsibility that we commit ourselves to the pursuit and attainment of environmental and social sustainability criteria. We believe that the judicious use of energy and water is not merely a measure to enhance our guests' experiences but is also a critical component of our contribution to the global environmental agenda. Our mission encompasses the provision of a healthy and safe working environment for all employees and the promotion of eco-friendly practices through our initiatives aimed at mitigating environmental challenges, including the depletion of natural resources and pollution.

Caravelle Saigon is honored to have established, enacted, and upheld an Environmental Management System that complies with the standards set forth by several esteemed organizations, reflecting our dedication to sustainable development.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY EXPERIENCES

Experience a stay at Caravelle that’s memorable not just for the exceptional service and luxury, but also for the positive impact you can make on our planet.
